title: Haste
tags: how to acquire haste in bg3
content:
3. Haste is a Lvl 3 Spell from the Transmutation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Baldur's Gate 3 Haste Information

Description: Target yourself or an ally to become Hastened: Gain an action, become faster and harder to hit. When the condition ends, becomes Lethargic. Effect: The target gains +2 AC, Advantage on Dexterity Saving Throws, double Movement Speed, and one extra Action per turn. Targe
